extendedInfo.description: Resize your photos fast with MiniMyPix, without loss of picture quality.  Don't share huge photos to social media sites, reduce photo file size first with MiniMyPix directly on your mobile phone - no need to copy them to your computer first.NOTE: This is the 30 day fully functional trial version of MiniMyPix. After the trial expires, you can upgrade or purchase MiniMyPix Premium for $EU1.55.Do you really need to resize photos before sharing them? Does photo file size really matter?  It does when sharing photos from your mobile or tablet using a limited data plan.So why are you sharing 8 mega-pixel photos over your limited data plan when you could quickly and easily reduce the photo size on your phone, retaining image quality and clarity, applying cool effects and then sharing them with MiniMyPix to your friends anywhere, any time without blowing your data limit?Or are you tired of syncing photos to your computer first just to resize and edit them on your computer before sharing them with your friends.In three easy steps, using MiniMyPix you can resize photos, edit them, and share/save your photos fast, directly on your phone or tablet. MiniMyPix also makes sharing your photos fun by adding cool effects to your photos with more effects coming soon!Different ways to use MiniMyPix:1) Open MiniMyPix from the launcher icon. Capture a new photo, or open an existing photo.  The photo is automatically resized, rotated if required and the photo quality is adjusted to improve the clarity of the photo to make every image pop.2) Alternatively open your favorite gallery app and share a photo to MiniMyPix to resize it and add effects, then from MiniMyPix share the photo just like you normally would to your preferred social or messaging app.  The benefit is the photo is on average 90% smaller when sent, saving you time and money.3) In the middle of composing a new email and you want to share a photo but you can't share a 3Mb photo? No problem just click attach in the email program, select MiniMyPix, select the Gallery app or other imaging app, and pick your photo.  MiniMyPix will then automatically resize the photo to your preferred default image dimension and attach the reduced photo (average 200 Kb) to the email.  It's that quick and easy.â FEATURES ââ¢  Resize photos to your preferred dimensions fast resulting in on average 80% to 95% smaller file sizes.â¢  Essential Photo Editing Tools â Photo Rotation, Cropping, Flippingâ¢  Color Adjustment: Adjust brightness, contrast, hue, saturation, gamma, sharpness, clarityâ¢  Image Effects: Light box, Oil painting, Lomofied, Picasso, Glassified and many moreâ¢  Share Photos to Facebook, Twitter, Picasa, Flickr, Google+ and many more social networks.â¢  Save photo as wallpaperLanguages supported: Currently this release supports only English but more languages coming soon.Having trouble with MiniMyPix? Email support on support@dk-squared-studio.com for assistance.We welcome you to check out our direct competitors which include: photo image resize - photoman, photo resizer, reduce photo size, resize lite, and image shrink lite.

reviews.title: Good one
reviews.comment: Very good app for photo editing
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome! Resized photos look sharp, simple to use.
reviews.comment: I love how you can easily open and resize photos by sharing them to to the app, or opening recently captured photos from the launcher list or select photos from the gallery and even take new photos. Pretty much all bases are covered.    The app performs as advertised and resizes photos to my desired dimensions and even better the pics are sharper and don\'t look as blurry as other resize apps on the market.  Plus I\'ve made some cool art like effects before sharing my pics on Facebook. I definitely recommend trying this app.
reviews.author: A Google User
